data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 3
data.expected_result: The correct numbers for every platform should be shown.
data.short_description: [Website bug] [Safari specific] Discord partner page shows 0 for every platform
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord Partners page - Scroll down to `THE TYPICAL DISCORD PARTNER HAS` - Observe the numbers for every platform there
